greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = number of iterations of map k -> A003188(A006068(k)/2) that are required (when starting from k = n) until k is an odious number.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
formula: If A010060(n) = 1 [when n is one of the odious numbers, A000069], then a(n) = 0, otherwise a(n) = 1 + a(A003188(A006068(n)/2)).
xref: Cf. A277812 (gives the odious number where such an iteration is finished at when starting from k=n).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 03 2016
